title: ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk -in for Agromet Observer Posts
description: The Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Agromet Observer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th can apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, ap...
